title: Account lost data
body: This was a platinum level 30 account and I had almost every character. all my data reset. I transferred my account from eune to na about a year ago and was playing on it too but since the start of this season there is no data of my old account. please help, any mods.

replies.body: I've got this account's history pulled up. It looks like it was created a few years ago, but I'm not seeing any history of purchases or region transfers whatsoever. It doesn't actually look like this account has played any games at all. I'm curious as to if you're actually referring to a different account that you had raised to Platinum, so reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to track that other account down for ya!
